description: When a patient enters new data in the Allergies section of Your Health Record in the web-based chart system, a new record is created in this table. NOTE: this is patient-entered data and is not part of the patient's official medical record.

columns.name: INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the "Your Health Record" allergy record.

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the web-based chart system account that is associated with the "Your Health Record" allergy record.

columns.name: ALLERGY
columns.description: The unique id of the allergen associated with the "Your Health Record" allergy record.

columns.name: ALLERGY_REACTION
columns.description: The unique id of the reaction to the allergy associated with the "Your Health Record" allergy record.

columns.name: ALLERGY_COMMENT
columns.description: Any text entered into the allergy comments field by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The date and time that this record was pulled into enterprise reporting

columns.name: ALLERGY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The allergy status category number for the "Your Health Record" allergy record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Deleted
